front.title: TIPC based TML for the ForCES protocol

abstract.t: This document describes a ForCES [ForCES] Transport Mapping layer (TML) based on the Transparent Inter Process Communication service [TIPC]. It is intended to be used when the ForCES protocol is transported over L2 carriers such as Ethernet, RapidIO or PCI- Express. TIPC has been specially designed for efficient and easy-to- use communication over L2 carriers, and is typically used to define clusters of loosely coupled nodes in such environments.
